name: Baby Climbing
description:
It's a 3D third-person platform adventure game.
You control a baby who dreams of jumping over obstacles.
You have to climb platforms without falling to reach
the end.
And collect the collectibles along the way
A game of jumping up a platform in the fastest possible time


It's a game where if you fall you have to start all over again, challenging your limits where you have to reach the end in the shortest time possible.



climb the platforms and complete the mission without falling and overcoming the obstacles
